name: Prepare request
info:
To use KPN APIs, an access token (also called bearer) token must first be obtained.

The bearer token is obtained by invoking an Authorization API (`loginAPI`) using a POST method.

The API payload is an object with the `client credentials`:
* `client_id`
* `client_secret`


Use your `client_id` and `client_secret` from KPN API Store.

If correct, the API returns a payload object that will contain a valid access token authentication in subsequest API requests.

name: Set request body
Prepare request
info:
Use Bearer token from previous request in the headers to authenticate API request.

Note: The bearer token gets retrieved from the payload of the previous authorization request: `msg.payload.access_token`
